verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yesterday, I thought I heard you speak to me,
Giving me a song to sing,
And I can't get it out of my head.
So hard to sing the words behind the melody;
You're whispering Your heart to me,
But there's no way to speak it.
So go out ahead,
And lead me on
To the places I
have never been before.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let Your glory be my song.
Let it shine on me.
Let it shine on me.
Let salvation be my song.
Let it shine on,
Shine on me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You and me - it's beyond my wildest fantasy
That You would bring eternity
For the whole world to sing it.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: I've got a song in my soul and it sings for You. (10x)
